name: Spooknight: starve your monsters
description:
The Game

On a Halloween night gone bad a big monster starts crawling through the city. Try running from him as long as possibile while collecting both candies and vegetables and watch out growing fat.

Broccoli makes you stronger but they give few points, while candies grows you fat but give more points. Collect candies or broccoli consecutively for a better result!

Entirely made in 48h for the Spooky 2D Jam #S2DJ2020 (https://itch.io/jam/spooky-2d-jam-2020);

Soundtrack - Aetheric by Uncan (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Uncanny/4Songs/Uncanny_-02-_Aetheric)

Controls

Left click or left arrow = move left;
Right click or right arrow = move right;
Space = jump;
R = restart;

Software

  • Game Engine - Game Maker Studio 2
  • Graphic Design - Adobe Illustrator, Paint.NET
  • Sound Design - Adobe Audition, Mixcraft 7, bfxr (https://www.bfxr.net/)

Team

Game Developer - Zeno Bianchini
Graphic Designer - Corradino Janigro

PROUDLY MADE IN ITALY BY  WOLF GAMES
